channel.title: Hello? Anyone Need Vps Help!
channel.description:
[b][size=18pt]Need Vps Help Don't Know Want To Do?[/size][/b] [i] About Vps Hosting I Got A Few Questions! Here They Are![/i]
I am planning to buy vps but I do not know what to do. Do you need Ubuntu? If Yes How Do You Make A Server In Ubuntu for Vps?
Ok Do I Need Ubuntu Server to run VPS? How do i make it in Ubuntu Server?
Just Give Me Step By Step That Would Be Great! :cool:

item.title: Hello? Anyone Need Vps Help!
item.dc:creator: @smkscape smkscape
item.description:
@smkscape wrote:

[quote=“Epic Steve, post:3, topic:361662”]First, the title is fucked up… You asked hello then asked a question and ended it with exclamation mark.

Fix’t
Hello! Anyone need VPS help?

And secondly, this is against the rules. Piss off.

Thirdly,

http://www.google.org/computing/linux/help/234668-how-run-server-ubuntu-9-04-linux-vps.html

change google.org to rune-serber. and the b in serber to a v.

Use a fucking tinyurl.[/quote]

Why are you so mad ? Hes just asking for help, anyways, to vakiownz, just google VPS information, or anything like that and you will get all information you need. I recommed to buy windows VPS because its lots easyer to run a server on.

Read full topic
